==Intro==
Can be used to locate and load custom templates for specific types.

If you need more granular control over WordPress's template selection and loading system, consider using [[Plugin_API/Filter_Reference/template_include|template_include]] instead.

This filter is used by [[Function_Reference/get_query_template|get_query_template()]] in {{Trac|wp-includes/template.php}}
